description: Pre-process the Susceptibility-weighted images and write out nifti files for feeding into PRELUDE (Phase Unwrapping Library of FSL).

scanner.title: Scanner name
scanner.description: Name of the scanner (one of ge, siemens or philips)

ge_file.title: GE input file
ge_file.description: Name of the input GE file (only compatible with --scanner ge option)

philips_file.title: Philips input file
philips_file.description: Name of the input Philips file (only compatible with --scanner philips option)

siemens_magnitude.title: Siemens magnitude file
siemens_magnitude.description: Name of the input Siemens magnitude file (only compatible with --scanner siemens option)

siemens_phase.title: Siemens phase file
siemens_phase.description: Name of the input Siemens phase file (only compatible with --scanner siemens option)

out_magnitude.title: Output magnitude file
out_magnitude.description: Name of the output magnitude file after preprocessing. Ensure it has a .nii suffix

out_phase.title: Output phase file
out_phase.description: Name of the output phase file after preprocessing. Ensure it has a .nii suffix
